application

Class PossibleGameApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.AbstractMultimediaApp
      • application.PossibleGameApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    app.MultimediaApp, event.MetronomeListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class PossibleGameApp
extends app.AbstractMultimediaApp
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener, event.MetronomeListener
    Main class for creating the application, handling user events, playing sounds and controlling the game.
    Author:
    Kevin Amrein and Affan Sheikh
